item.title: Barrows chest
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

case 10284:
if (objectID == 10284) { // Barrows Chest
if (playerHasItemAmount(605, 1) == true)
if (playerHasItemAmount(989, 1) == true)
if (playerHasItemAmount(788, 1) == true)
if (playerHasItemAmount(1542, 1) == true)
if (playerHasItemAmount(1590, 1) == true)
if (playerHasItemAmount(993, 1) == true)
deleteItem(605, GetItemSlot(605), 1);
deleteItem(989, GetItemSlot(989), 1);
deleteItem(1542, GetItemSlot(1542), 1);
deleteItem(1590, GetItemSlot(1590), 1);
deleteItem(788, GetItemSlot(788), 1);
deleteItem(993, GetItemSlot(993), 1);
addItem(Item2.randomDragon(), 1);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName +" lvl (" +combat + “) has just completed the Barrow’s Chest Mini game!”);
} else {
if (playerHasItemAmount(605, 1) == false)
if (playerHasItemAmount(989, 1) == false)
if (playerHasItemAmount(788, 1) == false)
if (playerHasItemAmount(1542, 1) == false)
if (playerHasItemAmount(1590, 1) == false)
if (playerHasItemAmount(993, 1) == false)

sendMessage(“You need all 6 keys to get the reward!”);
}
break;

I have this added, and when people click on the chest, they get free barrows, this didn’t used to happen…
